ai-tika-vin04t4:71_5: As before, so after the observance day, the lay person is not fully ordained. But after the observance-day procedure together with the monks, there is no offense for them.
ai-tika-vin04t4:71_6: In regard to this I ask you, “Are you pure in these four ways? ”
ai-tika-vin04t4:71_7: Do you have experiential confidence in these four kinds of mindfulness meditation? This is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin04t4:71_8: Or alternatively, do you have pure meaning?
ai-tika-vin04t4:73_0: The commentary on the offenses entailing expulsion is finished.
